name: Easter Drones
description:
A simple digital Easter Egg hunt put together with Asset Packs form Synty, and my Own Drone Controller Asset Pack. There is only one environment (the city map) but there are 10 groupings of 12 eggs allowing for shorter play sessions.

The thermometer icon on the right side indicates how close the play is to the finding the nearest egg. Hotter means the drone is looking towards the egg and is locationaly close as well. Cold means the opposite.

Keyboard:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

Left Mouse - Pickup Egg

Space - Go Up

Ctrl - Go Down

Game Pad:

L Stick - Move

R Stick - Look

A Button - Pickup Egg

R Trigger - Go Up

L Trigger - Go Down

General:

Esc or Start - Opens Menu

R - Resets Drone if stuck.
